pure interface of interface zeta.session.TextEditor

The documentated page. 
public interface TextEditor
{
    public abstract String getButtonName();
    public abstract void commit()
      throws IOException;
    public abstract void add(TextVisit cap);
    public abstract void visit(TextVisit cap);
    public abstract void reset();
    public abstract void open(File file);
    public abstract void unlock(File file);
    public abstract void reopen(File file);
    public abstract void close(File file,
                               boolean dontSave);
    public abstract void save(File file,
                              boolean silently);
    public abstract void saveRelated();
}
